item.title: Jesus Christ Is at the Center of the Restoration of the Gospel
item.description:
Jesus Christ Is at the Center of the Restoration of the Gospel by Elder Gary J. Coleman, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 162nd Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 1992
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Gary J. Coleman, Of the Seventy
